column4: Anyone know the best program for extracting .rar files with linux ubuntu?
assid ahh 7zip I'm familure with that one thanks assid
assid: doesn't look like it opens .rar though does it

rar is a non-free archive format created by Rarsoft. For instructions on accessing .rar files through the Archive Manager view https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FileCompression. There is a free (as in speech) unrar utility as well, see !info unrar-free
